alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Fayette; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 7:10PM CDT until July 28 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Fayette County in northeastern Iowa... Southern Winneshiek County in northeastern Iowa... Southeastern Chickasaw County in northeastern Iowa... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 710 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fredericksburg, or 11 miles southeast of New Hampton, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lawler around 715 PM CDT. Waucoma around 720 PM CDT. Fort Atkinson around 730 PM CDT. Calmar, Ossian and Spillville around 735 PM CDT. Decorah around 745 PM CDT. People attending Nordic Fest should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
